description: Metrics for node.js and express router status

panels.description: The [Apdex score](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Apdex) is the number of satisfied requests plus half of the tolerating requests plus none of the frustrated requests, divided by all the requests
panels.title: Apdex Score: target $target s, tolerated $tolerated s

panels.description: Average Requests per Second in the selected time range
panels.title: RPS

panels.description: 95% of requests are completed in less time than this.
panels.title: P95 Latency

panels.description: Number of requests in the selected time range
panels.title: Total Requests

panels.description: Rate of requests grouped by status (2xx, 3xx, 4xx, 5xx) over a $interval window.
panels.title: Requests per second

panels.description: distribution of HTTP response status codes (e.g., 2XX, 4XX, 5XX)
panels.title: Status Codes Breakdown
Apdex Score: target $target s, tolerated $tolerated s

panels.description: Number of requests in the selected time range
panels.title: Top 5 Success Count

panels.description: Number of requests in the selected time range
panels.title: Top 5 Error Count

targets.expr:
topk(5, 

        avg by (path)(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_sum{instance=~"$instance", status_code=~"[23]xx"}[${interval}])) 
        / 
        avg by (path)(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", status_code=~"[23]xx"}[${interval}]))
)

panels.description: Average duration of HTTP requests across all endpoints
panels.title: Latency

panels.description: CPU time used by application for every 1 second that has passed during the last $interval
panels.title: Rate of CPU Time Spent

panels.description: Time between scheduling a timer and its callback being evaluated.
panels.title: Event Loop Latency

panels.description: Number of active resources that are currently keeping the event loop alive. TTYWrap, PipeWrap, TCPServerWrap, TCPSocketWrap, Immediate
panels.title: Active Handlers/Requests/Resources

title: Node.js and Express Metrics
